verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> in the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me <S%H413>upon<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> which was as the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H4480>south.<s%> <S%H5045><s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H376>man,<s%> whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with thine <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> shall <S%H7200>show<s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> to the intent <S%H4616>that<s%> I might <S%H7200>show<s%> them unto thee art thou <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2008>hither:<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H2346>wall<s%> on the <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> and in the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> long by the <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2948>handbreadth:<s%> so he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1146>building,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and the <S%H6967>height,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> thereof, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the gate, which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And every little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H681><s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>eastward<s%> <S%H6921><s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H4480>side;<s%> <S%H6311><s%> they <S%H7969>three<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure:<s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H6311><s%>

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H1366>space<s%> also <S%H6440>before<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on this side, and the <S%H1366>space<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on that <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on that <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H6311><s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853>then<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H4480>roof<s%> <S%H1406><s%> of one little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of another: the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> <S%H352>posts<s%> of <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> even <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And <S%H5921>from<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2978>entrance<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And there were <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> to the <S%H361>porches:<s%> and <S%H2474>windows<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H6441>inward:<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> each <S%H352>post<s%> were palm <S%H8561>trees.<s%>

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> there were <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and a <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

And the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> was the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> from the <S%H4480>forefront<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%> and <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

And the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6440>looked<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H4480>side;<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And their <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and their <S%H361>porches,<s%> and their palm <S%H8561>trees,<s%> were after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6440>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto it by <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps;<s%> and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof were <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was over <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H4480>gate<s%> <S%H8179><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

After that he <S%H1980>brought<s%> me <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

And there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> like <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2474>windows:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> to go <S%H5930>up<s%> to it, and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof were <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and it had palm <S%H8561>trees,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> on that <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof.

And there was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H4480>gate<s%> <S%H8179><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof, according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And the <S%H361>porches<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof were <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof: and the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof, were according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> therein and in the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

And the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

The little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> thereof, the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, and the <S%H361>porches<s%> thereof, and the <S%H2474>windows<s%> to it round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and the <S%H6607>entries<s%> thereof were by the <S%H352>posts<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> they <S%H1740>washed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

And in the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> to <S%H7819>slay<s%> <S%H413>thereon<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

And <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> as one goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables;<s%> and <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3802>side,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was at the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables.<s%>

Four <S%H702><s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> were on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6311><s%> by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7979>tables,<s%> <S%H413>whereupon<s%> they <S%H7819>slew<s%> their sacrifices.
